item.title: Typescript基本使用
item.description: 类型 基础类型 // bool let isDone: boolean = false; // number let decLiteral: number = 6; let hexLiteral: number = 0xf00d; let binaryLiteral: number = 0b1010; let octalLiteral: number = 0o744; // string let name: string = "bob"; // array let list: number[] = [1, 2, 3]; let list: Array<number> = [1, 2, 3]; // 数组泛型 // tuple let x: [string, number]; x
